title: AlphaCasino
author: AlphaCasino
created_time: July 15, 2023, 11:06:01 AMLast edit: July 18, 2023, 05:42:51 AM by AlphaCasino
content: Hello everyone,We are excited to introduce Alpha Casino, a decentralized game platform based on web3 that offers a variety of fun and fair games powered by smart contracts and blockchain technology.Join us to First Launchpad sale for Web3 casino platform start on Jul 15st, 2023.Alpha Casino aims to create a new gaming experience that is transparent, secure, and rewarding for both players and developers. Players can enjoy more 50 games such as slots, roulette, blackjack, poker,Crash and more, while earning tokens and NFTs that can be used in the platform or traded in the market. Developers can create and publish their own games on Alpha Casino, and benefit from the platform's features such as cross-chain compatibility, low fees, and revenue sharing.Alpha Casino has its own native token, $CAL, which is used for playing games, staking, governance, and rewarding the community. $CAL holders can also participate in the platform's launchpad sale, which is hosted on BigSale.finance, a leading decentralized fundraising platform for web3 projects.The launchpad sale will start on July 15th, 2023, and will last for 7 days. The total supply of $CAL is 100 milion, and 10% of it will be allocated for the launchpad sale. The launchpad sale will be conducted in BNB, and BUSD.To participate in the launchpad sale, you need to connect wallet on BigSale.finance and complete Â process.For more information about Alpha Casino and the launchpad sale, please visit our website: https://alpha.casinoYou can also join our social media channels to stay updated and interact with our team and community:WebsiteLaunchpad Sale - Must be sure metamask is installed and switch to Binance Smart ChainTelegramYoutubeGithubGitbookWe hope you are as excited as we are about Alpha Casino and the launchpad sale. We look forward to seeing you on our platform and playing our games. Thank you for your support and interest.Alpha Casino Team---

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: your casino has been operating for many years and you appear here with this fundraising idea through the sale of your token it will sound as if during all these years that your casino has been operating you have not had any success and you are close to reaching bankruptcy, this will be the impression that anyone will have, as a way to avoid this, it might be better for you to provide some data such as:- how many years has the casino been operating- how many customers the casino got in these years that it has been operating- how much profit they had and losses they had- how many games were there at the beginning of the casino and how many games are there today- how much money was deposited in the casino and withdrawn from the casino- how much maximum money was earned by any user (a single user)this will make people able to analyze the growth or not of the casino to see if it will be advantageous to buy your token, because everyone wants to make a profit, when you invest in an altcoin or a casino token you need to make sure that the casino will have success so that the price of the token is very high and with that that person who bought the token will get big profits, so I hope you understand this and make this data available

comments.author: AlphaCasino
comments.body: Quote from: Slow death on July 15, 2023, 04:04:46 PMyour casino has been operating for many years and you appear here with this fundraising idea through the sale of your token it will sound as if during all these years that your casino has been operating you have not had any success and you are close to reaching bankruptcy, this will be the impression that anyone will have, as a way to avoid this, it might be better for you to provide some data such as:- how many years has the casino been operating- how many customers the casino got in these years that it has been operating- how much profit they had and losses they had- how many games were there at the beginning of the casino and how many games are there today- how much money was deposited in the casino and withdrawn from the casino- how much maximum money was earned by any user (a single user)this will make people able to analyze the growth or not of the casino to see if it will be advantageous to buy your token, because everyone wants to make a profit, when you invest in an altcoin or a casino token you need to make sure that the casino will have success so that the price of the token is very high and with that that person who bought the token will get big profits, so I hope you understand this and make this data availableWe are glad to introduce you to our casino and our token, which we believe will revolutionize the online gambling industry. We have established ourselves as one of the most trusted and reliable platforms in the market.As you can see, we have a proven track record of success and innovation, and we are not close to reaching bankruptcy. On the contrary, we are ready to take our casino to the next level with our token. Our token is not just a fundraising idea, but a strategic move to enhance our platform and create more value for our customers and investors. Here are some of the benefits of our token:- It will allow us to offer lower fees, higher payouts, and better rewards for our users.- It will enable us to create a decentralized and transparent system that will ensure fairness and security for our users.- It will empower us to expand our market reach and attract new customers from different regions and demographics.- It will help us to innovate and develop new features and games that will enhance the user experience and satisfaction.By investing in our token, you will not only support our casino, but also participate in its growth and success. You will be able to use our token to play on our platform, exchange it for other cryptocurrencies or fiat currencies, or hold it as a long-term asset that will appreciate in value over time. You will also be eligible for exclusive perks and privileges that will make your gambling experience more enjoyable and rewarding.We hope that this information has convinced you of the potential and profitability of our casino and our token. If you are interested in investing in our token, please visit our website for more details on how to participate in our token sale. Thank you for your time and attention.Sincerely,Alpha Casino Team
